altername_name: Imperial Dynasty: The Story of Arthur
name: Ya Se Chuan Shuo
overview: A 1995 RPG for the Sega Mega Drive by unlicensed Taiwanese developer Chuanpu. Publisher Ming Super Chip released two versions: the "Imperial Dynasty" version, showing a subtitle in Chinese; and the "The Story of Arthur" version, showing that text in English. At present, the only known difference is the text on the title screen. A strategy guide was also released.
